mapper.select: select nation "label", count(*) "counts" from client_member group by nation order by 2 desc

select * from ( select row_number() over(order by substr(to_char(reg_date),1,5)) rnum, substr(to_char(reg_date),1,5) "label", count(*) "counts" from client_member group by substr(to_char(reg_date),1,5) ) where rnum between 1 and 12

select label, count(*) "counts" from (select case when to_number(extract(year from sysdate))-yearofbirth<20 then '10대 이하' when to_number(extract(year from sysdate))-yearofbirth between 20 and 29 then '20대' when to_number(extract(year from sysdate))-yearofbirth between 30 and 39 then '30대' when to_number(extract(year from sysdate))-yearofbirth between 40 and 49 then '40대' when to_number(extract(year from sysdate))-yearofbirth between 50 and 59 then '50대' when to_number(extract(year from sysdate))-yearofbirth >=60 then '60대 이상' end label from client_member) group by label order by label

select * from ( select row_number() over(order by substr(to_char(reg_date),1,5)) rnum, substr(to_char(reg_date),1,5) "label", count(*) "counts" from business_member group by substr(to_char(reg_date),1,5) ) where rnum between 1 and 12 order by 2

select * from (select row_number() over(order by substr(to_char(res_createdate),1,5)) rnum, substr(to_char(res_createdate),1,5) "label", count(*) "counts" from reservation group by substr(to_char(res_createdate),1,5) order by 1) where rnum<=12

select store_seq,businessname,count(*) "counts" from(select cno,content,businessname,reg_date,store_seq from comments c join store s on c.bno = s.store_seq where sysdate - reg_date < 7) group by businessname, store_seq having count(*) >1
